results.title: Effects of renin-angiotensin system blockade on renal angiotensin-(1-7) forming enzymes and receptors.
results.text_hl: Combination therapy mimicked the effects obtained with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on plasma and urinary Ang I and Ang-(1-7) levels.

citations.NLM: Ferrario CM, Jessup J, Gallagher PE, Averill DB, Brosnihan KB, Ann Tallant E, Smith RD, Chappell MC. Effects of renin-angiotensin system blockade on renal angiotensin-(1-7) forming enzymes and receptors. Kidney Int. 2005 Nov;68(5):2189-96. PMID: 16221218
